title: The Apple Car may feature autopilot tech from a South Korean company
content:
News about Apple’s rumored car have been surfacing for a while now. It is said that the Cupertino tech giant is developing a self-driving electric vehicle that could launch in a few years. While the specifics revolving around it are still somewhat obscure, every now and then a new detail emerges online. The latest report

The post The Apple Car may feature autopilot tech from a South Korean company appeared first on xda-developers.
description: A report states that Apple has partnered with a South Korean company to developer its rumored car's autopilot technology.
